msra.exe

Windows GUI

msra.exe is the native Microsoft Remote Assistance tool.

Get Remote Support

MOTW File Explorer

Get technical support for your computer immediately with these steps:

  1. 1. Press Win-R on your keyboard.
  2. 2. Type msra and press Enter to open the Microsoft Remote Assistance tool.
  3. 3. Press Enter to continue.
  4. 4. Press Enter to confirm your selection.
  5. 5. Press Ctrl-L to focus the new window.
  6. 6. Press Ctrl-V to paste the desired configuration.
  7. 7. Press Enter to submit

After submitting, please wait until a remote support agent assists you.

Documenting Windows system tools for educational and legitimate system administration purposes
